body_html:
Your error is from the invalid device name generated in your code at this line:

    raw_devices = ['/gpu:{}'.format(k) for k in devices]

In your code, devices already contain device names therefore you should not add /gpu: to it.
body_text:
Your error is from the invalid device name generated in your code at this line:
    raw_devices = ['/gpu:{}'.format(k) for k in devices]

In your code, devices already contain device names therefore you should not add /gpu: to it.
body:
Your error is from the invalid device name generated in your code at this line:
```
    raw_devices = ['/gpu:{}'.format(k) for k in devices]
```
In your code, `devices` already contain device names therefore you should not add `/gpu:` to it.
